com.rey.material.widget

Interface Slider.OnPositionChangeListener

  • Enclosing class:
    Slider

    public static interface Slider.OnPositionChangeListener
    Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when thumb's position changed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onPositionChanged(Slider view, boolean fromUser, float oldPos, float newPos, int oldValue, int newValue)
      Called when thumb's position changed.

    • Method Detail

      • onPositionChanged

        void onPositionChanged(Slider view,
                     boolean fromUser,
                     float oldPos,
                     float newPos,
                     int oldValue,
                     int newValue)
        Called when thumb's position changed.
        Parameters:
        view - The view fire this event.
        fromUser - Indicate the change is from user touch event or not.
        oldPos - The old position of thumb.
        newPos - The new position of thumb.
        oldValue - The old value.
        newValue - The new value.
